attributes.action: Set the maximum cost of petrol and diesel at 90p per litre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the recently announced obscene profit levels of fuel companies the Government needs to agree a maximum per litre price of fuel, which should be no more than 90p per litre, enough is enough. Fuel costs are driving up the every day costs of food and manufactured goods, this combined with the national credit crunch is unacceptable.
